name: Belgium e-Invoicing Forum
goal: The goal of the Belgian e-Invoicing Forum is an informal platform welcoming all relevant stakeholders and providing 2 representatives in the European Multistakeholder Forum for e-Invoicing
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Institutional affairs, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: e-Invoicing / e-Procurement as a whole and more particulerely the B2G e-Invoicing directive / PEPPOL
